verses.name: Isaiah 49:10
verses.text: They shall not hunger nor thirst; neither shall the heat nor sun smite them: for he that hath mercy on them shall lead them, even by the springs of water shall he guide them.

verses.name: Isaiah 49:11
verses.text: And I will make all my mountains a way, and my highways shall be exalted.

verses.name: Isaiah 49:12
verses.text: Behold, these shall come from far: and, lo, these from the north and from the west; and these from the land of Sinim.
